name: Gyroscope web page at rest
description: Test that sensor reports ~0 rad/s total angular velocity when device is at rest.

name: Test web page +Z angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports positive angular velocity around the Z axis when rotating device counter-clockwise around its web page Z axis.

name: Test web page -Z angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports negative angular velocity around the Z axis when rotating device clockwise around its web page Z axis.

name: Test web page +X angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports positive angular velocity around the X axis when rotating device counter-clockwise around its web page X axis.

name: Test web page -X angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports negative angular velocity around the X axis when rotating device clockwise around its web page X axis.

name: Test web page +Y angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports positive angular velocity around the Y axis when rotating device counter-clockwise around its web page Y axis.

name: Test web page -Y angular velocity
description: Test that sensor reports negative angular velocity around the Y axis when rotating device clockwise around its web page Y axis.
